line_1: These dwell at such convenient Distance,
line_2: That each may give his Friend Assistance.
But I can call to my Assistance

line_1: You gain a prospect two fields distance.
Hence then, Sir Brine, and keep your distance:
line_2: Go lend the scullion your assistance;

line_1: The rabble keep at awful distance.
line_2: And, with a civet cat's assistance,
